long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will bring your web browsing, searches, the latest news, and gaming when you're bored, all within a click of a button.
The plugin will change your new tab to show 100 searches for each query and quickly see the last 10 news stories. You can also open and play a random game with a single click.
